entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
